EmailTemplate.name: SaveTheDate
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date for the Advisory Panel Private Dinner in San Antonio!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Event: Advisory Panel Private Dinner
When: Monday, April 2, 2012, 7:00 pm
Where: Bohanan's, San Antonio's Classic Steakhouse
Join OnePak for fine dining and a brief preview of the Online Return Center for technology returns.
Transportation provided to and from event.
Sponsored by OnePak, Inc.
